channel.title: VISERION - Spawn Server - Log in & PK - Clanwar events - Perfect Hybrid - New Se
channel.description:
[CENTER][b]Viserion is a new server. [/CENTER]
[CENTER][b]Register on forums and receive a mystery box![/b][/CENTER]
[CENTER]Links [url=http://viserion.org/]Viserion - Unreal Portal[/url] [url=http://viserion.org/client.jar]http://viserion.org/client.jar[/url][/CENTER]
[CENTER]Viserion has All Skills working, this includes Hunter, Summoning and Farming. Duel Arena Clan Chats Minigames Curse Prayers EP Drops Perfect Special Attacks Dicing Excellent Pking. Server tested with 200 + on, NO LAG. [/CENTER]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gvHWefq.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/f8a44bccbb9d5ff4254bf8fe86d586d1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/e938cbdc29e47b9415a2577eeeafadf1.png[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER]Instant Pking upon login.
[b]Spawn commands added.
Working ::max to get yourself level 126 straight away. Instant Pking upon login. Spawn commands added. 24/7 Uptime, without any lagg. 2x Bonus XP in a special skill, skill is different after every 48 Hours or after server reset. PK server with Skilling for more options to obtain items. 23 working skills, including summoning and hunter. Fully working prayers and spells including turmoil and leeching. Automated voting and donating system. Gain PK points by doing trivia, voting, skilling and killing other players Honor Points, be rewarded for playing. Added colored yells for Donators and Super Donators. PvP rating system added. An amazing Pvp rating System that will give you points at the end of the day based on your rating. Voting shop at home with great rewards. 2 Donator shops located at home. Active Forums. Weekly events with huge prizes to win. Bosses ( Godwars Dungeon ).
Download the client and spawn your stuff right away!
Features: All Skills working, this includes Hunter, Summoning and Farming Highscores Duel Arena Clan Chats Great Staff Minigames Curse Prayers EP Drops Perfect Special Attacks Dicing Excellent Pking Active forums and so much more![/b] [/CENTER]

Curse Prayers EP Drops Perfect Special Attacks Dicing Excellent Pking. Server tested with 200 + on, NO LAG. [/CENTER]

[CENTER]

[/CENTER]

Working ::max to get yourself level 126 straight away.

Spawn commands added.
24/7 Uptime, without any lagg.
2x Bonus XP in a special skill, skill is different after every 48 Hours or after server reset.

Fully working prayers and spells including turmoil and leeching.
Automated voting and donating system.
Gain PK points by doing trivia, voting, skilling and killing other players
Honor Points, be rewarded for playing.
Added colored yells for Donators and Super Donators.
PvP rating system added.
An amazing Pvp rating System that will give you points at the end of the day based on your rating.
Voting shop at home with great rewards.
2 Donator shops located at home.
Active Forums.
Weekly events with huge prizes to win.
Bosses ( Godwars Dungeon ).

Download the client and spawn your stuff right away!
